resources.string: "From the bottom navigation bar, tap the central button to open the camera. " + "Position the sheet music as straight as possible and take a photo. If you're happy with the image, " + "press 'Confirm'. Wait for the processing to finish, and then the score will open in the interactive editor, " + "where you can view the images, download the MusicXML file, or convert it to MIDI format."
2. How to Use MusicXML and MIDI Files?

MusicXML files can be viewed on websites such as soundslice.com/musicxml-viewer/. For MIDI files, you can import them into specialized apps or online platforms, for example, pianotify.com/import-midi-file.
"After adding a score, you will find it in the 'Recent Files' section. " + "Tap on the name of the score to open and view it in the interactive editor."
"You can add a score to favorites by tapping the menu (arrow) next to " + "the score name and selecting 'Add to Favorites'. You will then find them " + "in the 'Favorites' section of the main menu."
"Use the search bar at the top of the screen to quickly find " + "scores by name. The results are filtered as you type."
"The menu (arrow) next to each score allows you to add it to favorites, " + "remove it from favorites, or delete it completely from your device. " + "Warning: deletion is permanent!"
